name: Primordial Caster
desc:
Your blood seethes with elemental power.
Select an elemental damage type (acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder).
This feat can be selected multiple times, choosing a different damage type each time.
prerequisite: Requires the ability to cast one spell.
effects_desc: Your spells dealing that damage type ignore any damage resistance possessed by the target.
When you cast a spell that deals damage of the chosen type, you deal 1 additional damage for every damage die with a result of 1.
